helpTab.a1: Click the "Connect" button to start a session. When the avatar indicates it's listening, speak your command. You can interrupt the assistant at any time by simply speaking again.
helpTab.q2: How do I get and set up API Keys?

a2.weatherSteps:
1. Go to the <1>Visual Crossing Weather Data</1> website.
2. Click 'Sign Up' to create a free account.
3. After signing in, click your account name in the top-right corner and select 'Account' from the dropdown menu.
4. Your API Key will be visible on this page. Copy it.
a2.youtubeSteps:
1. Go to the <1>Google Cloud Console</1> and sign in.
2. In the top bar, click the project selector dropdown (it might say 'Select a project') and click 'NEW PROJECT'.
3. Give your project a name (e.g., 'Kaniska YouTube Key') and click 'CREATE'.
4. Ensure your new project is selected in the top bar.
5. In the top search bar, type 'YouTube Data API v3' and select it.
6. Click the blue 'ENABLE' button.
7. After it's enabled, open the navigation menu (☰) in the top-left, go to 'APIs & Services', then 'Credentials'.
8. Click '+ CREATE CREDENTIALS' at the top and select 'API key'.
9. A pop-up will show your new API key. Copy it.
a2.newsSteps:
1. Go to the <1>GNews</1> website.
2. Click 'Get a Free API Key' and register for an account.
3. Your API key will be available on your account dashboard.
a2.auddioSteps:
1. Go to the <1>Audd.io</1> website and sign up.
2. You will get a free trial key upon registration.
3. Find your API token in your account dashboard.
a2.inputTitle: Where do I input the keys?
a2.inputSteps:
1. In this app, click the Settings icon (⚙️) in the top-right corner.
2. Go to the 'API Keys' tab.
3. Paste your copied key into the correct input field.
4. Click 'Save & Validate Keys'.

aboutTab.title: About Kaniska
aboutTab.description: Kaniska, a sci-fi inspired female voice assistant that uses Gemini to understand commands in Hindi, search YouTube, and provide voice replies using the browser's built-in text-to-speech.
